help.title: Help & Support
help.subtitle: Get assistance with the census portal

q1.question: How do I register a new family?
q1.answer: Navigate to the Families section and click 'Add New Family'. Fill in all required information and submit the form.

q2.question: How can I update member information?
q2.answer: Go to the Members section, find the member you want to update, and click the edit button.

q3.question: How do I generate reports?
q3.answer: Visit the Reports section where you can generate various types of reports including family lists, member statistics, and village summaries.

q4.question: What if I forgot my password?
q4.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions to reset your password.

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: For technical issues or questions about using the portal, please contact our support team using the information above.
